question: Which of the following would not likely be a beneficial outcome of the use of anthropology to empower Native peoples?

answers.text: Indigenous people can be active participants in the research and preservation of their past or in addressing issues that impact them in the present.
Indigenous people can serve as contributors to anthropological research as cultural experts.
Indigenous peoples and anthropologists can work together in the forming or changing of policies that impact tribal peoples.
Anthropologists can be empowered in the research and collecting of knowledge as it relates to Indigenous culture.
